citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 p.m. on
22-JAN-20.
Called owner at listed number, waited 30 minutes, left voice message and flyer.

narrative:
